overview: Jill and Rufus are at the top of America's "Most Wanted" list. Presumed to be the new age Bonnie and Clyde, this young, all-American couple find themselves in the extreme need to flee the United States and take refuge in the mythical town of El Rey where they become the target of the town's Police department, a mysterious vigilante, a legendary mercenary and a fearsome crime lord.
title: Road to El Rey
